journey.title: From Business Counselor to Builder
journey.description: Worked at DTI-Rizal assisting MSMEs in registration, compliance, and entrepreneurial seminars — honing communication, presentation, and project management skills.

journey.title: Adapting to Tech
journey.description: Transitioned into web development through self-study and hands-on learning. My background in communication and management became a foundation for collaboration and problem-solving.

journey.title: Becoming a Developer
journey.description: Now working as a Junior Web Developer, building and maintaining applications using Next.js, Vue.js, React, Strapi, and Tailwind CSS — focusing on clean, responsive, and scalable systems.

journey.title: Balanced by Passion
journey.description: Outside of coding, I enjoy playing guitar, listening to metalcore, hitting the gym, and watching anime — keeping creativity and energy alive in everything I do.

experiences.title: Junior Web Developer
experiences.description: Contributed to full-stack development for a Next.js + Strapi web app and Pimcore PIMS project.
achievements: Developed and maintained features in a course-based web platform
Implemented reusable UI components and fixed layout issues
Extended Strapi content-types and customized API endpoints
Contributed minor updates to a React Native (Expo) app for iOS/Android
Built Symfony controllers and event listeners for backend logic
Configured DataObjects and admin interfaces in Pimcore
Automated imports and data synchronization between systems

experiences.title: Business Counsellor
experiences.company: Department of Trade and Industry – Rizal
experiences.description: Supported MSMEs through business counseling, compliance assistance, and training facilitation.
achievements: Organized training and seminars for MSME clients
Assisted with business registrations and documentation
Facilitated project proposal preparation and reporting

experiences.title: Sales Assistant
experiences.description: Delivered excellent customer service and handled store inventory and reporting.
achievements: Assisted customers with product selection and inquiries
Monitored stocks, prices, and store displays
Prepared reports including Inventory Balance and Loss & Breakage

experiences.title: BS in Business Administration, Major in Marketing Management
experiences.description: Developed leadership and analytical skills in business and marketing.
achievements: President, Business Administration Club – Antipolo Campus
